column3: News;The National Police are looking to arrest a suspected paedophile who fled the United States to Cambodia.------An Interior Ministry spokesman said that the ministry received a notice on Thursday from the US embassy stating that William David Brenner is wanted over the sexual abuse a child in his foster care in Greenwood
column6: we have received the letter and our police officers are working on the case
column7: ” Gen Sopheak said. “The US Regional Security Office in Cambodia has asked the General Immigration Department to arrest William Brenner.”------Mr Brenner is suspected of living in Preah Sihanouk province.------The notice also said Mr Brenner does not have valid travel documents
column8: a violation of Cambodian immigration law.------People with information are urged to contact local police immediately.------Photo: Provided by Johnson County prosecutor’s office------ ------
